title: Launch
skills_text:
When you combo, draw 1 card.
When a card in your life is flipped face up by one of your red card skills, you may flip this card over. If you do, draw 1 card and you can't flip your Leader Card to its front for the turn.
skills_back_text:
When this card attacks, choose up to 1 of your opponent's cards and it gets -5000 power for the battle.
When you combo, draw 1 card.
When a card in your life is flipped face up by one of your red card skills, you may flip this card over. If you do, draw 1 card and you can't flip your Leader Card to its back for the turn.

title: King Piccolo
skills_text:
You start the game with 6 life.
When this card attacks, you may choose up to 1 red 《Namekian》 or 《Demon Clan》 card in your hand and place it in your life face up. If you do, add 1 card from your life to your hand.
When your life is at 2 or less or you have 2 or more life flipped face up : You may draw 3 cards, then place the top card of your deck in your life and flip this card over.
skills_back_text:
When this card attacks, choose up to 3 red 《Namekian》 or 《Demon Clan》 cards in your hand and place them in your life face up, then add that many cards from your life to your hand.
If you have red 《Namekian》 or 《Demon Clan》 cards flipped face up in your life : Place the top card of your deck in your life face up, then combo with 1 face-up red 《Namekian》 or 《Demon Clan》 card in your life.

title: Bulma, Secret Supporter
skills_text:
If your Leader Card is a red 《Earthling》-only card with 10000 power or less : When a marker is removed from this card by an opponent's attack, flip up to 1 card in your life face up; at the end of the turn, flip all face-up cards in your life face down.
If your Leader Card is a red 《Earthling》-only card : You may choose 1 card in your hand and place it in your life. If you do, add 1 card from your life to your hand.

title: Towa, Dimensional Convoker
skills_text:
When this card is played, look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck, add up to 1 black 《Evil Wizard》, 《Demon Realm Race》, or 《Demon God》 card among them to your hand, then shuffle your deck.
, if your Leader Card is black : Play up to 1 skill-less 《Demon God》 card with 15000 power from your deck or Drop Area, then shuffle your deck if you looked through it; you can't activate the skill on copies of this card for the turn.

title: Chain Attack Gravy
skills_text:
If your Leader Card is a black 《Demon Realm Race》 card and it's your turn : When you use a black 《Evil Wizard》, 《Demon Realm Race》, or 《Demon God》 card in a combo, draw 1 card.
When this card is removed from your Battle Area by an opponent's skill, send up to 1 Battle Card from your opponent's Drop Area to their Warp.

title: Chain Attack Putine
skills_text:
When this card is removed from your Battle Area by an opponent's skill, send up to 1 Battle Card from your opponent's Drop Area to their Warp.
If your Leader Card is a black 《Demon Realm Race》 card and it's your turn : Up to 1 black 《Evil Wizard》, 《Demon Realm Race》, or 《Demon God》 card in your Combo Area gets +5000 combo power for the turn.

title: Mechikabura, the King's Summons
skills_text: , if your Leader Card is a black 《Demon Realm Race》 card and you place this card from your hand and 1 card from your life in your Drop Area : Send 1 Battle Card from your opponent's Drop Area to their Warp, play up to 2 black Battle Cards with 《Evil Wizard》 and/or 《Demon Realm Race》 with energy costs of 2 and different character names that aren't ＜Mechikabura＞ cards from your deck, then shuffle your deck. You can't activate the skill on copies of this card for the turn.

title: Shroom, a New Demon God
skills_text:
When this card attacks, send up to 1 Battle Card from your opponent's Drop Area to their Warp; if there are no Battle Cards in your opponent's Drop Area, choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards and send it to its owner's Warp.
, choose 1 of your black skill-less Battle Cards with an energy cost of 2 or 3 and return it to its owner's hand : Play this card from your hand.

title: Salsa, a New Demon God
skills_text:
When this card attacks, send up to 1 Battle Card from your opponent's Drop Area to their Warp; if there are no Battle Cards in your opponent's Drop Area, choose up to 1 black 《Evil Wizard》, 《Demon Realm Race》, or 《Demon God》 card with an energy cost of 2 or less from your hand or Drop Area and play it.
, choose 1 of your black skill-less Battle Cards with an energy cost of 2 or 3 and return it to its owner's hand : Play this card from your hand.

title: Temptation of the Mask
skills_text: If your Leader Card is a black 《Saiyan》-only card and you place 1 black ＜Bardock : Xeno＞, ＜King Vegeta : Xeno＞, ＜Vegeta : Xeno＞ or ＜Broly＞ card from your Drop Area at the top of your deck : At the end of the turn, play up to 1 ＜Dark Broly＞ card or up to 1 black Battle Card with an energy cost of 4 or less and ＜Masked＞ in its character name from your deck, then shuffle your deck.

title: Dark King's Flash
skills_text:
Negate the attack.
If your opponent has 5 or more energy : Your opponent can't play Battle Cards using Leader Card skills until the end of their next turn.

title: Explosive Barrage Slash
skills_text: If your Leader Card is a black 《Saiyan》 card : Negate the attack, then if you don't have a Unison Card in play, play 1 black Unison Card with no specified cost and 15000 power from your Drop Area or Warp with a marker on it.
